name: Black Bean and Avocado Burritos
author: CatFan
summary: This fresh, versatile salsa makes a great dip on its own, but it's equally good wrapped in a warm tortilla. For breakfast burritos, add an egg or two cooked to your taste. Salsa may also be enjoyed plain with tortillas chips.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 ounce) can corn, rinsed and drained
¼ cup sour cream, or to taste
directions: Combine avocados, tomatoes, black beans, corn, cilantro, red onion, oil, vinegar, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until salsa is well mixed
Spoon salsa into each tortilla and top with Monterey Jack cheese
Roll tortilla around filling to create a burrito
Warm burritos on a microwave-safe plate in the microwave until cheese is melted and salsa is warmed, about 45 seconds
